amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: ? SEC. __. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to eliminate, consolidate, co-locate, or plan for the consolidation or co-location of a Terminal Radar Approach Control (TRACON).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill for consolidation of TRACON in high threat urban areas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A037) Agreed to by recorded vote: 261 - 166 (Roll no. 281).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A037) offered by Mr. Hastings (FL).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A037) Agreed to by recorded vote: 261 - 166 (Roll no. 281).
